last_episode_to_air.name: Love Is Love
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ragini, along with Bharti's help, tries to free the spirits of the innocent women trapped in the villa. Horror

name: Ragini MMS Returns
overview: When Ragini joined a new college, little did she know that she was entering a realm where horrors lurked around every corner. It's scary. It's a must watch.

episodes.name: Sex Shaadi MMS
episodes.overview: One haunted building, two separate incidents in two weeks. What do they have in common? Is it a human or is it a spirit?

episodes.name: Bikini Special
episodes.overview: Ragini chases an unknown boy and gets locked in a dark room. What will happen with Ragini?

episodes.name: Sex Can Kill!!
episodes.overview: While Ragini tries to find the reason behind her spooky experiences, she sees Aalia committing suicide. Will she be able to link the incidents? Horror.

episodes.name: Slutagini@MMS
episodes.overview: Simran tries to find the truth behind Raj’s strange behaviour. Will she get help from Raj’s friend? Horror.

episodes.name: Sex Lies Aur CD
episodes.overview: The unknown woman foils Ragini’s attempt to escape from the college. Who is this woman and will she kill Ragini? Horror.

episodes.name: Sab (Para) Normal Hai
episodes.overview: Professor Bharti’s warning creates a panic among the students. Will Ragini and her friends escape unhurt from the haunted MMS college? Horror.

episodes.name: It's Not Over Yet!
episodes.overview: Who is Sundari Devi and how did she die? Fear reigns everywhere as Professor Bharti tries to make sense of the new and old mysteries surrounding MMS. Horror

episodes.name: Murderer In MMS
episodes.overview: Horror is in the air! Ragini follows the old woman into the woods and old woman follows them all in the MMS campus with a promise of death at every step. Horror

episodes.name: After-Party Sex Stories
episodes.overview: Finally, everyone agrees that MMS college is haunted and Ragini was right all along. Also, since Ragini gets a new lease of life it is time to party! Horror

episodes.name: Who's That Girl?!
episodes.overview: The old woman is back! And she has claimed another victim. Nobody is safe at MMS college. Meanwhile Raj and Simran are on their way to Shaktipur. Horror

episodes.name: Trapped In The Haunted House
episodes.overview: After seeing Sonia’s gruesome death everyone rushes to Prof. Bharti for help who makes it clear that Sundari Devi doesn’t want anyone to leave college. Horror

episodes.name: Climax Mein Climax
episodes.overview: The terror at the abandoned home continues. Now, they have only one chance to escape. The spirit is coming closer and this time it will communicate. Horror

episodes.name: Kyunki Do Mein Zyaada Maza Hai
episodes.overview: Paranormal investigator Meena from Canada arrives in India to investigate an old property. Victoria Villa is said to be haunted for years by the ghost of Captain Burns. But her visit gets marred by an unfortunate incident. Eleven years later, Ragini and her friends check in to Victoria Villa to celebrate their friend’s bachelor party.

episodes.name: Girls Trip, Girls Strip
episodes.overview: Ragini and gang meet the hot manager of Victoria Villa A.K.A Boston Villa. The girls can’t stop drooling over him. Ragini experiences some ghostly presence in the villa that makes her nervous. Meanwhile, the haunted Boston Villa also faces another real-life threat from a local business.

episodes.name: Maza Ya Saza
episodes.overview: The search for Ragini ends in the basement. She has no idea how she ended up there, but she faintly recalls seeing an old man. With the help of Rahul, Ragini tries to find out about the past of Victoria Villa, Mr. Burns, and his wives. To connect with the possible spirits lurking in the villa, the girls take the help of a Ouija board. It’s clear, the spirit wants everyone to die!

episodes.name: Sex, Lies Aur Bhootiyapa
episodes.overview: Ragini and the rest of the guests at Victoria Villa head for a crazy party out in the wild. On the way, Ragini meets a mysterious old woman who claims to know Ragini. But everyone suggests her to ignore the old lady as she learns some more disturbing facts about Victoria Villa.

episodes.name: Karoge Toh Maroge
episodes.overview: In the middle of the night, Ragini leaves her room in search of Varsha. She notices that the painting of Victoria has suddenly changed. Kirti and Harshit go wild and make love to each other when Varsha walks in on them. Later, the spirit kills her first victim.

episodes.name: Not A 'Good' Bye
episodes.overview: It's clear that Varsha is possessed. But is she possessed by Lady Victoria’s ghost? If yes, then why does she communicate in Marathi? Ragini tries to investigate this while attempting to send Lady Victoria’s ghost back with the help of the Ouija board.

episodes.name: Lekin Yeh Kahani Hai Kiski?
episodes.overview: Ragini and friends decide to leave the villa even as Rahul tries to stop them. But as they ride out of the city, they lose their way and end up reaching the same spot. Later, on the way, the old lady meets Ragini and warns her that none of them will be able to get out of this easily.

episodes.name: Cruel Intentions
episodes.overview: Ragini and Rahul question Kadam about the villa’s dark history. He tells them about the killings of paranormal investigators a few years ago. They also learn that Captain Burns was trying to capture the souls of all the women he brought at the Victoria villa. Does that mean the souls are still stuck in the negatives?

episodes.name: You Can Run But You Can't Hide
episodes.overview: What's the connection between Ragini’s past and Victoria villa’s spirits? Ragini and gang return to Mumbai, but the ghosts of the villa follow them here. Back at the villa, Shekhar continues to dig deeper into the property’s murky past. Will this saga ever end?

episodes.name: Ragini ka MMS Dekha Kya
episodes.overview: An unwanted guest visits Ragini’s house party. Kirti invites Ragini’s ex-boyfriend to get back at her. Horror

episodes.name: Behak Jaoge Toh Marr Jaoge
episodes.overview: Ragini continues to investigate the reason behind the recent paranormal activities around her. She learns the identity of the old man whom she saw at the Victoria Villa. Horror

episodes.name: You Can't Escape Your Past
episodes.overview: Ragini learns her connection with Savitri Devi. She also learns about the ghosts of other women she kept seeing in the villa. Horror

episodes.name: Creeps Beware! She Is Out to Kill
episodes.overview: Ragini and gang struggle to find a pattern in the killings happening around them. But the cops arrest everyone as they suspect them to have murdered all these people. Horror

episodes.name: Trapped and Hunted
episodes.overview: Ragini gets closer to the truth of the horrors committed in Victoria Villa. Horror

episodes.name: Love Is Love
episodes.overview: Ragini, along with Bharti's help, tries to free the spirits of the innocent women trapped in the villa. Horror
